timeline.bodyText: Can we use consistent naming convention i.e. whiteListedURLs

timeline.bodyText: @shivamshriwas In case of s3 urls, is it expected they will be in https://s3.xxxx format and not "s3://xxx"?
timeline.author: chauhang

replies.bodyText:
Yes,
This pattern is just used to verify whether given URL is a valid http / https  URL.
replies.author: shivamshriwas

timeline.bodyText: @shivamshriwas Please add another test for multiple urls test scenario, and failure cases where url is an invalid one

replies.bodyText:
Added multiple urls test scenario
enhanced existing test cases as well with now exception messages also being compared.
